    Interface IAimpExtensionAlbumArtCatalog

    This interface is a extension for the IAimpServiceAlbumArt service. It allows for the plugin to add a menu item to the context menu for external album art catalogs.

    Inherited Members
    IAimpExtensionAlbumArtCatalog2.Show(IAimpFileInfo, Bitmap)
    Namespace: AIMP.SDK.AlbumArtManager
    Assembly: AIMP.SDK.dll
    Syntax
    public interface IAimpExtensionAlbumArtCatalog : IAimpExtensionAlbumArtCatalog2, IAimpExtension

    Gets icon for menu item, icon must be 16x16.

    Show(String, String, String, out Bitmap)

    This method will be called on menu item click.

    Declaration
    AimpActionResult Show(string fileUrl, string artist, string album, out Bitmap image)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.String fileUrl

    The file URL.
    System.String artist

    Optional. The artist. , can be null
    System.String album

    Optional. The album.
    System.Drawing.Bitmap image

    Image instance, can be null if catalog does not provides an ability to select album art immediately. For example, if the extension just open external link via Internet browser.
